transcript:
Customer: Hello Hello
Executive: Ji madam Chetna madam Chetna baat karegi hamare yaha se
Customer: Ji madam
Executive: Madam aapki side se na ek feedback receive hua tha services ko leke to maine isi vajah se call kiya like aap kuch issues face kar rahe services mein
Customer: Madam wo cashback ka issue hai
Executive: Kiska cashback
Customer: Cashback
Executive: Nahi nahi cashback wala issue to I think aapka resolve ho gaya na aapki madam se baat ho gayi hai
Customer: Nahi hua hai madam ne mana kar diya hai wo hum abhi nahi kar payenge usko
Executive: Main cashback ke liye nahi call kiya hai aapko
Customer: Actually
Executive: Nahi nahi actually ek jo feedback receive hua wo bas not good karke feedback diya hai aur android se feedback gaya ab mujhe janna hai ye aapne diya hai ki sir ne diya hai
Customer: Maine nahi diya
Executive: Achcha sir ne diya hai
Customer: To ye services ke liye hai
Executive: To aapke alava aur kaun person isko dekhte hain
Customer: Ek madam aur hai unko shayad sir ne bola hoga baki abhi jo hamara issue hai sirf wo services ke liye nahi hai madam hamara sirf cashback ke liye hi chal raha hai issue
Executive: Nahi wo to kab ka close ho gaya wo last I think aapka discussion hua
Customer: Bola tha ki nahi madam kal hi hamari video service sir ne mana kiya tha
Executive: Kya mana kiya sir ne
Customer: Ki wo cashback ka hum tha teen mahine pehle se package nahi le payenge hamara jab package khatam hoga tabhi hum usko usme revert karwa payenge usme hi adjust karwaenge hum keh rahe the
Executive: To madam ne kaha tha ki teen month pehle se hi aap purchase kar lo par abhi hamare aur bhi expenses hai madam to hum purchase nahi kar payenge
Customer: Ek ek ek cheez simple hai madam main aapse ye nahi keh rahi ki aap yaha pe package purchase kijiye
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has cashback issue.

- Wants to know who gave the feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive said cashback issue was resolved.

- Executive informed that feedback was for services.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- cashback, feedback, services
